# Globals.Lerp method

Linear interpolate between two values

```csharp
public static double Lerp(double x0, double x1, double alpha)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| x0 | Starting value |
| x1 | End value |
| alpha | interpolation amount |

## Return Value

A value between x0 and x1
